column4: help! gparted just hangs, and gives the error "Unable to open /dev/fd0 read-write (Read-only file system).  /dev/fd0 has been opened read-only.". How else can I re format a partition?
are you sure fd0 is a hard drive? sounds like a floppy or cdrom
yeah, it's supposed to be a floppy. Only I don't have a floppy! I also commented out the entry for /dev/fd0 in fstab, then restarted, but I still have the same problem.
I'm trying to reformat a partition, but gparted just hangs, spits out the above error in the command line, and does nothing.
